## Properties

| Property               | Attribute                | Description                                                             | Type     | Default     |
| ---------------------- | ------------------------ | ----------------------------------------------------------------------- | -------- | ----------- |
| `ariaLabel`            | `aria-label`             | A label which describes the contents of the modal to assistive devices. | `string` | `undefined` |
| `initialTabpanelIndex` | `initial-tabpanel-index` | A label which describes the contents of the modal to assistive devices. | `number` | `undefined` |
